fields.headline: News in brief
fields.bodyText: A taste of Shropshire A selection of Shropshire hotels, restaurants, pubs, shops and specialist food suppliers offering locally grown produce have been brought together in a new publication, Deliciously Shropshire . For a free copy of the guide, which features six pages of Michelin and AA-acclaimed restaurants, telephone Shropshire Tourism on 01743 462462. Toronto flights resume Air Canada will resume its Toronto services from Manchester and Glasgow on 8 April following their suspension after 11 September. The Manchester service will initially be four times a week, the Glasgow service three times a week. Both will go daily from 1 June. (08705 247226). Healing holidays Mark Warner has introduced a new programme of spa breaks at selected hotels in the Mediterranean, featuring treatments such as reiki healing, food allergy testing and aromatherapy. A week's holiday will cost from £534 per person, plus £199 for for treatments. (0870 770 4226). Sharp reminder The airport operator BAA is trying to cut down on delays over Easter by reminding passengers not to carry sharp objects in their hand luggage. For a complete list of restricted items call 0800 169 5569.
